title: 1957 Taça de Portugal Final
text: The 1957 Taça de Portugal Final was the final match of the <a href="1956%E2%80%9357%20Ta%C3%A7a%20de%20Portugal">1956–57 Taça de Portugal</a>, the 17th season of the <a href="Ta%C3%A7a%20de%20Portugal">Taça de Portugal</a>, the premier Portuguese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> cup competition organized by the <a href="Portuguese%20Football%20Federation">Portuguese Football Federation</a> (FPF). The match was played on 2 June 1957 at the <a href="Est%C3%A1dio%20Nacional">Estádio Nacional</a> in <a href="Oeiras%20Municipality%2C%20Portugal">Oeiras</a>, and opposed two Primeira Liga sides: <a href="S.L.%20Benfica">Benfica</a> and <a href="S.C.%20Covilh%C3%A3">Sporting da Covilhã</a>. Benfica defeated Sporting da Covilhã 3–1 to claim a ninth Taça de Portugal.
